thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com | 4 of 30
thread.title: Mohan Mahtani

author: Mohan Mahtani
title: Mohan Mahtani
text: I was diagnosed with breast cancer and started chemo in November. Ever since then I have used endoca suppositories and it has helped me to control my nausea and sleep better. I am also type 1 diabetic and suffer from gastro paresis so nausea was a huge concern. I can only say I tried 1 night without it as I had run out and saw a huge difference the next night when my supply arrived. The reason for 4 stars is I have no idea about future use and effects, but, for now I'm happy with quality and exceptional service.
